articles.title: US Sinks 3 Ships, Kills 10 In Response To Houthi Red Sea Attack - NDTV
articles.description: US helicopters repelled an attack by Iran-backed Houthi militants on a Maersk container vessel in the Red Sea, sinking three ships and killing 10 militants, according to accounts by American, Maersk, and Houthi officials on Sunday.
articles.content:
The naval battle underlines the risk of a regional escalation in fighting.

articles.author: Frances Stead Sellers
articles.title: Four years on, long covid still confounds us. Here's what we now know. - The Washington Post
articles.description: As many as 7 percent of Americans report having suffered from a slew of lingering symptoms after enduring covid.
